Healthcare Records System

#Cinema4D   #After Effects

visualized the next generation OS for clinicians about identifying patient personal data. Healthcare records are complicated composites of data. How to organically present all these data? How to make sure data can be shared across different locations? As a UI/UX designer, my answer is to design a uniform UI system to organize the data for better user experience: easier share of data, better data visualization and faster data retrieval.
